Hi,
J2EEUnit has been donated to the Apache Software Foundation and has
been renamed to Cactus during this migration. Please try it and give
me your feedback ... :)

The new location is http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/cactus

Thanks for your interest.
Vincent Massol
(Cactus creator and current maintainer)
